payload.title: Verify complete coherence of WorkflowMethodology: Protocol, Command, Adapter, Schema and Code
payload.description: Following 5-layer systematic review process. Verify: (1) Protocol↔Command coherence, (2) Protocol/Command↔Adapter blueprint, (3) 3-layer coherence, (4) Code+tests vs blueprint, (5) Schema 100% generable from protocol. Check guild-based validation, state transitions, integration with FeedbackAdapter (6 methods). Use task_protocol.md as quality reference for schema completeness.
